title: What are the experiences of St. Augustine that influenced his philosophy about self? - Quora

response.answer_text: That is, unfortunately, too long of a story for this forum. And, it doesn’t lend itself to a short and succinct summary. However, Saint Augustine himself told us all about that in great detail in his short and easy to read book Confessions. Since you are obviously interested in him, I suggest you find a copy of that book in a library or book store and read it. It is inexpensive and widely available. Plus, it is well worth your time to read it — especially if you are Roman Catholic as I am.
